data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Damascus, Syria that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Damascus, Syria
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Damascus to agree with you and with one another.
Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Damascus, Syria.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Damascus, Syria to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Arab, Jordanian people.
Father, encourage the 152 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 152 believers in Damascus.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the state of Damascus an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.
